self.title: Build your online presence with Oleg Rõbnikov Web Development
text: Hello, I'm Oleg Rõbnikov, a professional web developer with years of experience in building websites and online shops. I specialize in providing customized solutions that cater to your unique business needs. My services are designed to enhance your online presence and make it easy for you to manage your website or online shop. Let me introduce you to my products and extras that can help you achieve your goals.

prod.name: blog
prod.title: Personal Blog or Home-About-Contacts page
prod.slogan: Showcase yourself with our Personal Blog or Home-About-Contacts page!
prod.price: Includes 3 business days. Price: starting from 150 EUR.
text: Oleg Rõbnikov Web Development offers a Personal Blog or Home-About-Contacts page that is perfect for individuals or small businesses who want to showcase their personal brand or business information. I work with you to create a website with editable content that can be expanded into a content management system for your blogging or other publishing activities. The project only takes 3 business days and starts at a price of 150 EUR. I am dedicated to providing the best customer experience for my clients, and I take pride in delivering top-notch solutions that meet their specific needs.

prod.name: biz
prod.title: Business Page or Single Page Application
prod.slogan: Elevate your business with our Business Page or Single Page Application!
prod.price: Includes 5 business days. Price: starting from 270 EUR.
text: For larger businesses, I offer a Business Page or Single Page Application that can help elevate your business to the next level. My base project includes more than three routes and dynamic presentation of your content, and can later be expanded into a Progressive Web App that provides a better user experience for your customers. I work closely with you to ensure that the end product meets your business needs and exceeds your expectations.

prod.name: shop
prod.title: Online Shop/ e-commerce page
prod.slogan: Boost your sales with our Online Shop/ e-commerce page!
text: If you're looking to sell your products online, I can create an Online Shop/ e-commerce page with product cards and payment systems. Oleg Rõbnikov Web Development can help you create an online shop that meets your business needs.

extras.title: Languages, Hosting, SEO, and Custom Projects
text: I offer a variety of extras that can help you enhance your website or online shop. These include:
Extra languages available: English, Russian, German, Estonian, Vietnamese, Chinese come with additional cost.
You will need a hosting service and a domain name for your website. You can use your own or I can provide them to you for an additional fee.

Search Engine Optimization is also an additional feature. I can help you optimize your website for search engines, which will help you rank higher in search results and increase your website traffic. I optimize the website build itself for best loading speed, and provide keyword, description, and content management with the help of Artificial Intelligence at an extra cost. This feature can increase the delivery time, but it is well worth the investment. My goal is to help you achieve the best possible results from your website or online shop.

Finally, I offer custom projects that include expanding your existing project or making changes to enhance graphic design, performance, or content. I charge hourly or per day or week, depending on your needs. I am committed to providing transparent pricing and high-quality service to all my clients.

action: Get in touch with Oleg Rõbnikov Web Development today to learn more about our services and how we can help you create an online presence that represents your brand!
